highlights: Developed easier data abstractions by combining Apollo (networking) with Zustand (state management) into an internal data library.
Reduced developer lead time by sharding test runners and making them complete in 3 minutes instead of 6 minutes.
Created a static code analyzer to find code that has a high probability of exposing personal identifiable information.
Created frontend documentation that led to better code quality. Created ESLint rules to force developers to comply with established codebase practices.
Reduced overall oncall engineer burden and burnout by creating a Slack ticketing system for issue delegation.
Sped up local development and testing through a codemod that adds support to dynamic Storybook imports.
Created a codemod to transform Storybook stories into unit tests.
Migrated legacy React Native native dependencies into more stable Expo plugins leading to easier breaking releases.

projects.name: Cat Express Shop
projects.description: Created a headless e-commerce store with Next.js and Sanity.
